channel.title: Npc dialogue
channel.description:
Hello moparscapers, well I am on a Delta base and wanted to make a npc dialogu, but when I make it, the npc's talk only one time, and when you click on Click here to continue, it doesn't go to the second dialogue, it just ends. Like the tutorial man npc id: 2244 He talks 1 time and not the second or more. But santa talks like more times.
pic: [img]http://img102.imageshack.us/img102/1206/dialogue.png[/img]
So when I click on "Click here to continue" It don't goi to the next dialogue of the player or npc.
Like I aded this: [code] case 300: playertalk4("Hey, my name is "+playerName+".", "I am testing the dialogue now", "I hope it's working.", "Well I see it works at the moment!"); addItem(5, 1); break;
case 301: talk4("Test", "I am testing the dialogue now", "I hope it's working.", "Well I see it works at the moment!", 2244); break;[/code]
It just does't go to the second dialogue case 301. I just don't get it.

item.title: Npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Hello moparscapers, well I am on a Delta base and wanted to make a npc dialogu, but when I make it, the npc’s talk only one time, and when you click on Click here to continue, it doesn’t go to the second dialogue, it just ends. Like the tutorial man npc id: 2244
He talks 1 time and not the second or more. But santa talks like more times.

pic:

So when I click on “Click here to continue” It don’t goi to the next dialogue of the player or npc.

Like I aded this:

[code] case 300:
playertalk4(“Hey, my name is “+playerName+”.”, “I am testing the dialogue now”, “I hope it’s working.”, “Well I see it works at the moment!”);
addItem(5, 1);
break;

		case 301:

talk4(“Test”, “I am testing the dialogue now”, “I hope it’s working.”, “Well I see it works at the moment!”, 2244);
break;[/code]

It just does’t go to the second dialogue case 301.
I just don’t get it.

Read full topic
